akas: The Super Hero Squad Show (original title)
The Super Hero Squad Show Greece (DVD title)
akas from release info: The Super Hero Squad Show (original title)
The Super Hero Squad Show Greece (DVD title)

1.title: Another Order of Evil: Part One!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

1.plot: With all of Villainville in jail, the Super Hero Squad is about to disband. Just then Captain Marvel disappears on his way to a peace mission, leading to hostility between the Kree and Skrull empires.

2.title: Another Order of Evil: Part Two!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

2.plot: The Super Hero Squad has been captured by the Skrulls. But Falcon reveals they have a stowaway on the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier, namely the Scarlet Witch.

3.title: World War Witch!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

3.plot: Thanos acquires the Time Gem and attempts to send the Super Hero Squad back a billion years in the past. But Scarlet Witch uses her hex power to avert the time beam, only to end up in World War Two all by herself.

4.title: Villainy Redux Syndrome!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

4.plot: Tired of having to suffer Captain America's therapy sessions, Doctor Doom plans a prison break. Phase one is getting the Super Hero Squad out of the way by organizing a wild Fin Fang Foom chase.

5.title: Support Your Local Sky-Father!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

5.plot: Zeus challenges Odin to a contest of champions between their favorite offspring, Hercules and Thor. The Mayor wants to broadcast this event on TV and gets the Invisible Woman to slip into Asgard unnoticed with a video camera.

6.title: Whom Continuity Would Destroy!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

6.plot: Thanos challenges the Grandmaster for the Mindstone. They pit three Squaddies (Iron Man, Hulk & Scarlet Witch) vs the Squadron Supreme (Nighthawk, Hyperion & Power Princess).

7.title: Double Negation at the World's End!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

7.plot: Thanos has the Space Gem stolen from him by his older sister Nebula. She uses the Squad Helicarrier's Teleporter to escape, but ends up in the Negative Zone. Wolverine and H.E.R.B.I.E. team up as they were the only ones aboard the Helicarrier at the time. Having just returned from a trip to Six Eggs Over Easy amusement park, Iron Man & Falcon venture into the Zone to save them.

8.title: Alienating with the Surfer!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

8.plot: Galactus is about to devour the Skrull Homeworld because the Silver Surfer is too busy fooling around with the Infinity Sword. The Squadies delay the Hulk's bath and head off into space.

9.title: Blind Rage Knows No Color!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

9.plot: Controlled by Thanos' mind gem, Hulk goes on a sleepwalking rampage. Thor, Iron Man and Wolverine enter the realm of Nightmare to find an answer.

10.title: Lo, How the Mighty Hath Abdicated!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

10.plot: Enchantress puts a spell on Odin to make him marry her but since she has no royal blood, Thor has to take his fathers place as ruler of Asgard. Meanwhile Magneto and Quicksilver are looking for the Scarlet Witch and assume she is being held captive by the Super Hero Squad.

11.title: So Pretty When They Explode!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

11.plot: Thanos is destroying the Nova Corps to capture the Power Gem. Iron Man enlists Hercules and She-Hulk for extra strength factor to face off in outers space.

12.title: Too Many Wolverines!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

12.plot: Super Hero City is invaded by free roaming Wolverines. The original Logan smells out that Egghead is behind the creation of his clones. He teams up with Reptil and Firestar, the former being unaware that the latter is also his science fair partner at school.

13.title: Pedicure and Facial of Doom!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

13.plot: When Doc Doom returns to Latveria, he finds his mother has turned castle Doom into a luxurious spa. And the among the chilled out guest are several members of the Super Hero Squad.

14.title: Fate of Destiny!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

14.plot: As soon as Thanos has finally acquired all six Infinitiy Stones, he is immediately confronted by (in this order) Doctor Doom, the Super Hero Squad and the Silver Surfer, wielder of the Infinity Sword.

15.title: The Ballad of Beta Ray Bill! (Six Against Infinity, Part 1)

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

15.plot: Dark Surfer has banished the Squaddies through time and space. Thor finds himself on space station Scuttlebut where janitor Beta Ray Bill is holding off the Stranger's attack. What is more, Thor agrees to do so without the help of Mjolnir.

16.title: Days, Nights, and Weekends of Future Past! (Six Against Infinity, Part 2)

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

16.plot: Falcon & H.E.R.B.I.E. arrive 40 years into an alternate future where the world is governed by Sentinels, and ruled by the Scarlett Empress. They team up with the aged Magneto and the last living hero known only as 'The Man'.

17.title: This Man-Thing, This Monster! (Six Against Infinity, Part 3)

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

17.plot: Iron Man enters a world without heroes, ruled by Dracula and his mummies. He teams up with two 'good monsters': Man-Thing and Werewolf by Night, while waiting for his armor to recharge.

18.title: The Devil Dinosaur You Say! (Six Against Infinity, Part 4)

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

18.plot: Wolverine lands on a dinosaur world where the High Evolutionary wants to separate MoonBoy and his tribe of Hill Folk from Devil Dinosaur and his kin. Meanwhile, the Mayor faces off against the Dark Surfer.

19.title: Planet Hulk! (Six Against Infinity, Part 5)

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

19.plot: Hulk crash-lands on the planet Sakaar and is forced to enter gladiatorial combat by the Red King.

20.title: 1602! (Six Against Infinity, Part 6)

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

20.plot: Scarlet Witch ends up in the Marvel 1602 universe where she helps the inhabitants of Super Hero Town face Captain Doom and his pirates. Afterwards, she is tried for witchcraft.

21.title: Brouhaha at the World's Bottom!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

21.plot: Cap, Ms Marvel & Mr. Fantastic travel to the Savage Land in an attempt to return the Squaddies from all the different dimensions they have been exiled to. But Baron Strucker and Hydra are also there, seeking a way to escape from Earth.

22.title: Missing: Impossible!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

22.plot: Impossible Man has been kicked out by his wife, so he asks to stay in the Squaddies Helicarrier. But then he gets the idea to take over the Universe from Dark Surfer to impress the Impossible Woman.

23.title: Revenge of the Baby Sat!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

23.plot: Wolverine and Hulk become unlikely babysitters when Iron Man, Scarlet Witch and Falcon are turned into toddlers by the Dark Surfer's Time Stone.

24.title: Soul Stone Picnic!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

24.plot: Ms. Marvel instructs the Squaddies to help Captain Marvel fight the Dark Surfer, but she, Thor and Iron Man end up in the Soul Stone with Thanos and Warlock.

25.title: When Strikes the Surfer!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

25.plot: Thanks to the wisdom of Warlock, the Super Hero Squad has figured out that each one of them can use their specific Strength Factor to counter one of the Infinity Stones.

26.title: The Final Battle! ('Nuff Said!)

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

26.plot: It's the final showdown between the Squad and their former team member, the Dark Surfer with the fate of the entire universe at stake.

1.title: And Lo... A Pilot Shall Come!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

1.plot: Mole Man unleashes Megataur, Tricephalous and Manoo on Superhero City while searching for a fractal buried deep beneath the ground. The Super Hero Squad tries to stop both him and his minions, but Mole Man still has Fin Fang Foom waiting in the wings.

2.title: To Err Is Superhuman!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

2.plot: Reptil joins the Super Hero Squad and Wolverine is assigned to be his mentor. He immediately gets to prove his worth as the Squad races to stop Doom and the Wrecking Crew obtaining a hidden fractal.

3.title: This Silver, This Surfer!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

3.plot: The squad gets frustrated when Silver Surfer cannot get the hang of Earth customs.

4.title: Hulk Talk Smack!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

4.plot: Hulk picks up a fractal and turns into the gray hulk. In this incarnation he is super smart, but also looks down on his teammates and fighting bad guys.

5.title: Enter Dormammu!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

5.plot: Doctor Strange is acting weirder than usual, and magic is affecting the heroes and villains in unexpected ways. When Strange opens a portal to the Dark Dimension, the dread Dormammu enters Super Hero City and soon becomes invincible when he obtains all the recovered Infinity Fractals.

6.title: A Brat Walks Among Us!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

6.plot: A bratty 3-year old wears a fractal tiara gaining a terrifying power over reality itself.

7.title: Oh, Brother!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

7.plot: Loki borrows some of Doom's henchmen to start a war in Asgard, leaving the Lethal Legion headquarters less well defended. This prompts Iron Man to try and get at the villains' fractal stash.

8.title: From the Atom... It Rises!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

8.plot: The mysterious Scorpio steals a Collider control program from Stark Industries and manages to keep one step ahead of the Super Hero Squad at all times. An impressed Doc Doom wants Scorpio, not to mention the Stark tech, to help him create a black hole.

9.title: Night in the Sanctorum!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

9.plot: Enchantress uses her magic to crash the Helicarrier into the Great Wall near Villainville and Ms. Marvel blames Falcon for the crash. After attempts to bunk in at Stark Industries, Punisher's van, and Reptil's house, they try the Sanctum Sanctorum where Doctor Strange warns them that there is a magic threat responsible for their misfortunes.

10.title: This Forest Green!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

10.plot: Falcon is doubting his own usefulness on the Squad. When a miniaturized Egghead steals an Infinity Fractal on the Helicarrier, Ant-Man shrinks most of the Squaddies down to the villains size.

11.title: O, Captain, My Captain!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

11.plot: Wolverine wants to quit being a Squaddie and is reassigned to the All Captain Squad. As 'Captain Canada', he joins Captain America, Captain Britain, Captain Australia, Captain Brazil and Captain Liechtenstein. Their first mission pits them against Plant Man in the South American Rainforest. Meanwhile, back in Super Hero City, Doctor Doom is trying to recruit the Ringmaster into his Lethal Legion and Reptil steps up to replace Wolverine's animal factor in the SHS lineup.

12.title: If This Be My Thanos!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

12.plot: Thanos approaches Doom with an unholy alliance and asks the Lethal Legion to steal an artifact from the Baxter Building. Meanwhile The Super Squad teams up with the Fantastic Four to fight off a Skrull invasion.

13.title: Deadly Is the Black Widow's Bite!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

13.plot: Shield agent Black Widow helps the Super Hero Squad out in a fight and is invited to stay aboard the Helicarrier. Little do the Squaddies realize she is actually Mystique in disguise and reporting to Doctor Doom.

14.title: Tremble at the Might of M.O.D.O.K.!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

14.plot: When an Infinity Fractal is attached to M.O.D.O.K.'s head, he gains the power to drain those of others. Soon, the Mighty M.O.D.O.K. rules Villainville with Loki as his new BFF (Best Fiend Forever).

15.title: Mental Organism Designed Only for Kisses!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

15.plot: Enchantres plans to make Thor fall in love with her by using an Asgardian Love Lutefisk. But Ms. Marvel ends up loving M.O.D.O.K. instead. Thor is only interested in Valkyrie anyway.

16.title: Invader from the Dark Dimension!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

16.plot: When Baron Mordo possesses Iron Man turning him into the Iron Menace, Hulk and Silver Surfer must team up with Doctor Strange and Valkyrie to form a team of Defenders and stop Baron Mordo's evil plot.

17.title: Tales of Suspense!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

17.plot: War Machine teams up with Iron Man when Doctor Doom, Crimson Dynamo, and Melter band together in a plot to eliminate Iron Man. Meanwhile, Wolverine and Reptil face off against Abomination and M.O.D.O.K. in a game of golf.

18.title: Stranger from a Savage Land!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

18.plot: When a smilodon appears in Super Hero City, a mysterious jungle lord named Ka-Zar shows up. Meanwhile, the Lethal Legion have plans for the smilodon.

19.title: Mysterious Mayhem at Mutant High!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

19.plot: Captain America sends Wolverine back to Xavier Academy to get his diploma and finish his remaining credits. Reptil tags along to see what Xavier Academy is like. To make matters worse, Ringmaster shows up and hypnotizes the entire X-Men team.

20.title: Election of Evil!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

20.plot: Egghead runs for Mayor and somehow manages to brainwash everybody into thinking he's a nice guy - except for Wolverine and the Ex-Mayor.

21.title: Hexed, Vexed, and Perplexed!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

21.plot: Magneto is working with Doom to rob all the Infinity Fractals from the Vault. His sinister plan involves letting his children, Quicksilver and the Scarlet Witch befriend the SHS to get the entry codes.

22.title: The Ice Melt Cometh!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

22.plot: Team Toxic (Paste Pot Pete, Pyro and Zzaxx) has built a giant super spinner machine on the North Pole that can spin the Earth really fast. But it's destruction causes the polar ice caps to meld, flooding Super Hero City. Now the Super Hero Squad seeks help from Ice-Man as well as the Lethal Legion to dry up the Earth.

23.title: Wrath of the Red Skull!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

23.plot: To show his minions what real villainy looks like, Doom thaws out the infamous WWII menace, the Red Skull.

24.title: Mother of Doom!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

24.plot: Doom conquers Chthon's dimension where his mother has been held captive. Once freed however, 'Coco' Von Doom proves to be anything but grateful. Meanwhile Chthon asks the Super Hero Squad to help him get his realm back and Odin orders Thor to return to Asgard and leave Earth behind.

25.title: Last Exit Before Doomsday!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

25.plot: Stardust arrives on Earth to announce the coming of Galactus, devourer of worlds. Captain America and Ms. Marvel begin constructing a space ark to save the inhabitants of Earth while the SHS team up with the Fantastic Four to face Galactus.

26.title: This Al Dente Earth!

episode of.title: The Super Hero Squad Show (TV Series 2009–2011)

26.plot: Galactus is about to devour Earth and not even the combined power of all the Super Heroes (and even some villains) can stop him. Iron Man decides to gather all the Infinity Fractals and reforge the Infinity Sword.

imdb.title: The Super Hero Squad Show
plot: Marvel's greatest heroes and evilest of villains battle it out in action packed, yet somewhat satirical alternate universe-style adventures.::tb4000
